titles.title: Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
To provide for the exchange of certain Federal land and State land in the State of Utah.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 30 - 0.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-909.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 743.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary:
Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration Exchange Act of 2023
This bill ratifies an agreement between the Utah School and Institutional Trust Lands Administration, the state of Utah, and the Department of the Interior for the exchange of certain federal and state lands in Utah.
The bill provides for the equalization of values of such lands.
The bill provides for the withdrawal of
federal land to be conveyed to Utah from mineral entry prior to the exchange, and state land conveyed to the United States from all forms of appropriation and disposal.
